books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Tense turning points for three couples at a backyard barbecue gone wrong.
books.name: TRULY MADLY GUILTY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, recruits and trains a doctor from Jerusalem to help capture a secret ISIS terrorist in France.
books.name: THE BLACK WIDOW

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: A couple on the run wake up married with no memory of their wedding and the need to retrace their steps.
books.name: ILLUSION TOWN

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: After the death of Will Traynor, Louisa Clark joins a grief support group that may lead her to new love.
books.name: AFTER YOU

books.author: by Vi Keeland
books.description: Reese dismisses a chance encounter with a smug stranger, until he turns out to be her new boss.
books.name: BOSSMAN

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: A lieutenant investigates a snatched-baby cover-up.
books.name: FATAL IDENTITY

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Four women come together after the death of a friend to sort her belongings and take stock.
books.name: THE HOUSE ON OLIVE STREET

books.author: by Heather Graham
books.description: A cruise ship entertainer and a member of the F.B.I.'s paranormal unit search for a killer in Alaska.
books.name: DEADLY FATE

books.author: by Linda Fairstein
books.description: After a designer's death, Alex Cooper tries to flush a murderer from New York's fashion world.
books.name: KILLER LOOK

books.author: by J. R. Ward
books.description: The suicide of a Kentucky distiller may be murder after all.
books.name: THE ANGELS' SHARE

books.author: by Emma Cline
books.description: In the summer of 1969, a California teenager is drawn to a Manson-like cult.
books.name: THE GIRLS
